subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Roberto Castro, whose aunt was the L.P.G.A. player Jenny Lidback, said she taught him patience and persistence. He is tied for second with four players at the Humana Challenge.
snippet: Roberto Castro, whose aunt was the L.P.G.A. player Jenny Lidback, said she taught him patience and persistence. He is tied for second with four players at the Humana Challenge.
